plant.title: Roses
plant.summary: True roses (Rosa spp.) are non-toxic to cats! However, thorns can cause mouth or paw injuries, and store-bought bouquets may be treated with pesticides or preservatives that are harmful.
plant.what_to_do:

2. Avoid floral foam (often contains toxic phenol).
3. Keep vase water cleanâ€”stagnant water can harbor bacteria.
